author: ajsutton
content:
Given light client sync came up on the call last night, I wrote some thoughts on how it may work out - not comprehensive and in particular I think there needs to be more consideration around details like the EL returning `SYNCING` for one fork but not others but possibly useful: https://hackmd.io/s0mC78fHSZqhssRwJbLK9g
It doesn't even try to cover the security and 1-day finality assumptions Vitalik (I think) raised either - they're definitely good questions that would need investigating.
